data.text: Nain tabe hagegi nigo gena roroa, Huqe,
Huqe, gu ragasi eu dena qarui mateana.
Gimiu nona tangaloi gogona nein galohagi na Huqe,
Huri a nona meroana mo eno mahogi biti,
Tavohe nongu tutugoro mo eno, nam veve vena,
O Huqe, tavohe gom leogareagi eu
?Hava lalaie nge talehe tare vena neu nau mate?
O Huqe, go rongo au me go hagavi eu,
Nigo gu dori na nongu tangiana silo hawana.
Huri ve a lologu na huri ehi lawego,
